subject: Coaches and Managers
Tennis
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Bergelin, a leading Swedish tennis player of the 1940s and ’50s, was best known for coaching Bjorn Borg to 11 Grand Slam championships.
snippet: Mr. Bergelin, a leading Swedish tennis player of the 1940s and ’50s, was best known for coaching Bjorn Borg to 11 Grand Slam championships.
